mapper.select: select count(*) as total from review where pId=#{pid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (pId, uId, pName, pColor, reDate, uName, reContent, reGrade, purId) VALUES (#{pId},#{uId},#{pName},#{pColor},now(),#{uName},#{reContent},#{reGrade},#{purId});
mapper.update: update review set reContent=#{reContent},reGrade=#{reGrade} where reId = #{reId}
